channel.title: deep learning on Srujan Jabbireddy

item.title: Find Amenities in a House
item.description: Developed an end-to-end web application for detecting 30 household amenities using FlaskAPI and GCP Used YOLOv5 model architecture on collected Dataset and achieved a mAP@0.5-0.95 of 0.4 Improved model Precision to 43% and mAP@0.5-0.95 to 0.5 using transfer learning with COCO weights Check full write up and User App
